name: Pirate Adventure (itch) (UncommonSenseGames, Raven Insights)
description:
The Pirate Adventure is a short resource management game. Sink ships, form outposts and trade with existing settlements.

The game was created in a four day long game jam on the theme of "Exploitation". This is an early build and still needs a lot of polish. We would love to hear your feedback so we could make it as good as possible in the future.
